title: Accidentally Spent RP on Kled instead of IP - No refunds left
body: I went to buy Kled with IP, but accidentally spend my RP on him. I have over 25k IP so there was no need to use RP to buy him. I am also out of refunds from around 2 years ago. Can anyone help me get a refund?

replies.body: I made a previous reply, but I took a deeper look into this and see that Kled was actually purchased for 7800 IP here.  It looks like everything is okay!
